name: Trójkącik
description:
Trójkącik

Trójkącik, is a video game (duh), in which you play as a triangle chased by lava, and you can also use boost, and the game is hard, but not as hard as the development process, it was meant to be finished in 3 hours, it took me 2 months to stop procrastinating and finish it

Special thanks to Frogrammer for creating the soundtrack for this masterpiece, and to Nik for creating a trailer for this masterpiece
